query:
ALTER TABLE prompts 
ADD COLUMN source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Tech Horizon',
ADD COLUMN model VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'General',
ADD COLUMN complexity ENUM('Beginner', 'Intermediate', 'Advanced') DEFAULT 'Intermediate',
ADD COLUMN useCase VARCHAR(200);
